page.title: 06LUDLOW BOOKSHOPS
page.content: There are 4 booksellers in Ludlow,3 secondhand or antiquarian,the fourth selling new books.Several other retail shops,normally Preedy and Dereen Yeo,both newsagents,sell books alongside other goods. Severnside books,132 Corve St.(John Edwards)is a general secondhand bookshop and remainder wholesaler,also a local publisher. Offas Dyke Bookshop,41 Broad St. (Stephen Bainbridge)is an antiquarian bookshop selling mainly to institutions and trade buyers by mail order. L.G.Heywood,30 Mill St.,is a dealer in secondhand and antiquarian books on topography of Wales and the Borders. Castle Bookshop,5 Castle St.(F.V.& P. Bell) est.in 1952,is a general book- shop,school supplier and stationer specialising in local history.
